thread.title: Hall sentenced in assault of his 1-year-old daughter
thread.title_full: Hall sentenced in assault of his 1-year-old daughter

author: democratandchronicle.com
title: Hall sentenced in assault of his 1-year-old daughter
text:
A Rochester man was sentenced for the assault of his 1-year-old daughter in state Supreme Court on Wednesday. Nikey Hall, 26, was sentenced to 25 years in state prison and five years of post-release supervision by Justice Alex R. Renzi.
Hall assaulted his daughter at his home in Rochester on Jan. 5. Doctors said the child sustained blunt force trauma to the head, leading to permanent brain damage that will keep her from ever walking or talking.
He will begin serving his sentence immediately.
WCLEVELAND@Gannett.com
